channel.title: A little trouble with client(tempary file)
channel.description: well the only thing i can download these clients is in uppit due to blockings.mk first i want to save the file insteade of it being a temp. file kk,well once i hit the download button on client i want in moparscape it make its go to uppit(good so far)then one i click the download button it'll pop up that its downloading but it doesnt let me choose rather or not i get to make it a temp file or a saved file. (so main piont)....i want to be able to make it a saved file so i can use winrar to extract and use this client any help?
